title: Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse

elements.title: A global database of land management, land-use change and climate change effects on soil organic carbon
elements.contents:
A global database of land management, land-use change and climate change effects on soil organic carbon
Feb 14, 2022 - Meta-analysis_Soil_carbon
Beillouin, Damien; Demenois, Julien; Cardinael, Rémi; Berre, David; Corbeels, Marc; Fallot, Abigaïl; Boyer, Annie; Feder, Frédéric, 2021, "A global database of land management, land-use change and climate change effects on soil organic carbon", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/KKPLR8, CIRAD Dataverse, V2
This dataset comprises data from a systematic review done after a comprehensive literature search using Scopus, Web of Science, Ovid publisher and Google Scholar for peer-reviewed meta-analyses and systematic reviews up to early 2020 that reported on soil organic carbon. This glo...

elements.title: Genotypic and phenotypic dataset for Grain yield in an indica rice diversity panel
elements.contents:
Genotypic and phenotypic dataset for Grain yield in an indica rice diversity panel
Jan 28, 2022 - UMR AGAP
DJERRAB Doâa; DINGKUHN Michael; GRENIER Cecile; FROUIN julien; Julie Mae Criste Pasuquin; REBOLLEDO Maria-Camila, 2022, "Genotypic and phenotypic dataset for Grain yield in an indica rice diversity panel", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/Z1ATYE, CIRAD Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:gfiklsdOzEjPuBMqUpXnMw== [fileUNF]
Genotyping and phenotypic dataset for GWAS analysis of Phenomics of Rice Adaptation and Yield (PRAY) project conducted in China, Colombia, India, Phillipines, Senegal from 2011 to 2016. Genotyping matrix contains 208 631 SNPs x 281 accessions of PRAY project. Phenotypic data are...

elements.title: Exploration des liens entre agriculture et sécurité alimentaire : Une enquête auprès des femmes du gouvernorat de Sidi-Bouzid, en Tunisie centrale
elements.contents:
Exploration des liens entre agriculture et sécurité alimentaire : Une enquête auprès des femmes du gouvernorat de Sidi-Bouzid, en Tunisie centrale
Jan 20, 2022 - UMR MOISA

MYCOPLASME(CIRAD)
Jan 14, 2022UMR ASTRE
Équipe mycoplasme.

elements.title: OptiReUse, a decision support tool for wastewater reuse in agriculture irrigation based on Life Cycle Assessment results
elements.contents:
OptiReUse, a decision support tool for wastewater reuse in agriculture irrigation based on Life Cycle Assessment results
Jan 11, 2022 - UPR HORTSYS
Biard, Yannick; Kalboussi, Nesrine, 2021, "OptiReUse, a decision support tool for wastewater reuse in agriculture irrigation based on Life Cycle Assessment results", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/YLP1BA, CIRAD Dataverse, V3
This decision support tool was designed to evaluate the environment efficiency of wastewater reuse for agriculture irrigation among other options. The aim of this decision support tool is to guide the interpretation of LCA results by reducing, gradually, the non-discriminant impa...

elements.title: Dataset of Guillemot et al. (2022) Small and slow is safe: on the drought tolerance of tropical tree species, Global Change Biology
elements.contents:
Dataset of Guillemot et al. (2022) Small and slow is safe: on the drought tolerance of tropical tree species, Global Change Biology
Jan 6, 2022 - UMR Eco&Sols
Joannès Guillemot, 2022, "Dataset of Guillemot et al. (2022) Small and slow is safe: on the drought tolerance of tropical tree species, Global Change Biology", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/HLBVJG, CIRAD Dataverse, V1
This dataset contains measurements of ten functional traits describing drought resistance, the fast-slow and stature-recruitment trade-off axes in 601 tropical woody species. Data were obtained from a screening of the literature, conducted in March 2021. The functional traits des...
